comments:
Build ID: Eclispe 3.2.2

Steps To Reproduce:
In a simple eclipse application, if one attempts to pop up a dialog window prior to creating the display, will cause an exception - 

java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.Dialog (initialization failure)

More information:

Created an attachment (id=65434)
Patch to Jface

The patch fixed the problem we saw.
Susan, I believe we fixed this one but am not sure how to find it.  It had to do with class loading on a non-UI thread.

yes, we moved the image initialization from the Dialog class to the image registry in bug #142299.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 142299 ***
